messages.subject: FW: YourDictionary.com
messages.msgSnippet: [From the hs-reviews email list] ... [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
messages.messageBody:
[From the hs-reviews email list]

> From: spread@...
> Subject: YourDictionary.Com
>
> LANGUAGE ARTS, LANGUAGE LEARNING
> Your Dictionary .Com
> <http://www.yourdictionary.com>
> It has incredibly cool language tools, word games that help you discover
> the complexities and nuances of language, a rich assortment of crossword
> puzzles, translation tools, hundreds of specialty dictionaries (law,
> medicine, finance, sports, sciences, and more), articles by the world's
> leading linguistic authorities, its own Word of the Day (that can be
> e-mailed to you daily), plus language courses and grammars galore. It even
> has a "lookup button" that lets you search their dictionary for any word
> on any website, right from your browser. You'll get the story behind the
> story about that word including pronunciation, definition, usage and
> etymology, and more!
>
> --Catherine <mailto:crm55@...>
>
> All forwards from this list must contain this footer: Subscribe at
> <http://www.hsfree.com>.
>


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
